subject: Self Care
title: Mindfulness and Stress Reduction
description: One-minute skill: Mindfulness and Stress Reduction.

hook.text: Kabat-Zinn's MBSR program reduced chronic pain by 50% in patients who had tried everything else.

buildup.text: Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction is an eight-week program now offered in over 700 hospitals worldwide.

discovery.text: MBSR lowers cortisol, reduces blood pressure, and decreases inflammatory markers in clinical trials.

twist.text: Mindfulness doesn't remove stressors. It changes the relationship to them. The pain stays, the suffering shifts.

climax.text: Reacting less intensely to stress is as valuable as having less stress. Mindfulness delivers both.

punchline.text: You can't control events. You can control your response.
